sen.e: According to the story of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of sun goddess) described in Nihonshoki, when Ninigi arrived at Kasasa-no-misaki Cape after descending to Takachiho-no-mine in Hyuga, Kotokatsukunikatsunagisa appeared and presented his own province to Ninigi.
